pages.text: The $(item)Amulet of Wrath$(), when held anywhere in the inventory, allows its wearer to focus their power, giving them the ability to, when $(thing)sneaking$() and $(thing)jumping$() in place, stomp down on the ground hard enough to create a $(item)shockwave$() that hurts any other living creatures close by.$(br)This, of course, comes at the cost of some $(aura), stored in the form of, say, an $(l:items/aura_cache)Aura Cache$().
